attributes.action: make legislative changes to give people who harm or kill animals tougher punishment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pets are some peoples only social interaction, they become a part of our families. Criminals break into houses and harm and often kill animals to prevent them barking. Although not quite the same as the murder of a child, mother or sister, the killing a family pet is extremely distressing for all of the family. The law needs to reflect this.
